abstract: Compass Diversified Trust, a publicly held private equity firm, said on Thursday that it would hold a $128 million follow-on public offering to repay its corporate debt. In a press release, the firm, which currently holds six middle-market companies in a range of sectors, will sell eight million shares at $16 a share.
lead_paragraph: Compass Diversified Trust, a publicly held private equity firm, said on Thursday that it would hold a $128 million follow-on public offering to repay its corporate debt. In a press release, the firm, which currently holds six middle-market companies in a range of sectors, will sell eight million shares at $16 a share.
